Add a pinch of salt and pepper.
Whisk the eggs until fully combined.
Heat a nonstick skillet over medium heat.
Add a small amount of butter or oil to coat the pan.
Pour the eggs into the skillet and let them sit for a few seconds.
Gently stir the eggs with a spatula, then spread them evenly across the pan.
Let the eggs cook undisturbed for about 1–2 minutes until mostly set.
Add any fillings like cheese, herbs, or vegetables on one half of the omelet.
Carefully fold the omelet in half using a spatula.
Cook for another 30 seconds, then slide the omelet onto a plate.
Serve hot with toast or your favorite sides.
